questions:
What is the photo about?
   A) Nature and landscapes
   B) Daily life and people
   C) Art and a statue
   D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
   A) A peaceful nature scene
   B) A sports event
   C) A goblin statue
   D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
   A) A large tree
   B) A statue
   C) A group of people
   D) A body of water

What is in the center of the photo?
   A) A bench
   B) A statue
   C) A person
   D) A tree

What is in the background of the photo?
   A) Mountains
   B) A green wall with posters
   C) A lake
   D) A playground

What is in the foreground of the photo?
   A) A wooden deck
   B) A flower bed
   C) A water fountain
   D) A picnic table

What material is the statue made of?
   A) Metal
   B) Wood
   C) Stone
   D) Plastic

What kind of figure does the statue depict?
   A) A historical figure
   B) A goblin creature
   C) An animal
   D) A modern person

What is the statue standing on?
    A) A pedestal
    B) A tree stump
    C) A rock
    D) A metal base

    A) Tools
    B) Pouches and a head
    C) Jewelry
    D) Weapons

What kind of footwear is the statue wearing?
    A) Boots
    B) Sandals
    C) Sneakers

What is the texture of the statue?
    A) Smooth

    C) Glossy

What kind of structure is in the background?
    A) A building
    B) A green wall
    C) A fence
    D) A bridge

What kind of artwork is displayed on the wall in the background?
    A) Paintings
    B) Posters and maps
    C) Sculptures
    D) Photographs

What is the base of the statue made of?
    A) Stone
    B) Wood
    C) Metal
    D) Plastic

    A) Embroidery
    B) Buttons and stitching
    C) Beading

    A) No headgear
    B) A hat with ears

What is the statue’s posture?
    A) Sitting

    C) Kneeling
    D) Reclining

What is the primary color of the statue?
    A) Green
    B) Brown
    C) Black
    D) White

What kind of detail is present on the statue’s chest?
    A) Armor plating
    B) Straps and buttons
    C) Embroidery

    A) Smooth

    A) Large & Pointed

    A) Smooth

    A) A belt

A) Modern art
B) Classical art
C) Folk art

A) Concrete
B) Wood
